attributes.action: Show us how & when you will have us living within our means to avoid bankruptcy.
attributes.additional_details: The cost of Healthcare, Education and Welfare equates to £99 per week for every living person so a family of 4 immigrants (including a home) costs us more than £500 per week for a man to do a job that others will not do whilst at the same time we pay capable men large sums of money to stay at home and do nothing. Is it surprising we are facing bankruptcy? Please see my website www.mrms.uk for many more alarming facts about the way Government is running our Country.
attributes.background: We are facing bankruptcy because Gov overspent Tax Revenue £536 ml every single day during 2005-15 (£625 ml 15-16) but we are allowing more than 6000 immigrants into our Country each week all of whom want at our expense somewhere to live, healthcare, education for their children and money to live on

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
